name: 【Aug 4 Updated】Dribbble Dark Mode
description: Dribbble Dark Mode Dribbble Dark Mode gives Dribbble a darker look for a better viewing experience and makes it easier to focus on the shots you're watching. Features: - Dark Mode - Support the brand new dribbble design - Colorful style theme - Block Ads - Stay updated until Dribbble launches the official dark mode. Note: Please feel free to tell me if anything isn't properly, the problem will soon be resolved.
